title: When your smurf in Gold V is playing with Plat 4's...
body: You quickly learn how bad the players are in this region. How on earth are you at 200 games in this season (how tf are you getting time for this btw?)  and yet your fall back plan is blame the lowest rank on your team, who has 80% of the teams gold from solo kills alone. This region shouldn't even have rankings it's so terrible, highest cs at 15 mins bar the rare player even goes above 100. Rank =/= skill, get over yourselves and improve.

replies.body:
As a point being Gold doesn't actually imply Mechanical skill.

Example KP (Youtube streamer in the Siv HD group) is gold, and is horrid at CSing (and Siv himself isn't great) but they are good at the OTHER aspects of the game.
Claims to be a smurf yet 50 ranked games and gold ahahahahahahahahhaa

> [{quoted}](name=vClub WishDr,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dOdAQc0z,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-20T23:11:17.257+0000)
>
> Claims to be a smurf yet 50 ranked games and gold ahahahahahahahahhaa

wat if gold smurf?
Considering it was placed in Bronze 4 from a mate, I think that's alright. Oh enlighten me yung vClub wishDr
In silver we always get over 100 CS at 15 mins kek.

Yeah that's definitely *not* true, haha.

Even in Gold I see people ending 40 minute games with like 160 CS, it's not unheard of.

Don't insult the OCE player base just because you had a bad experience with one player, no the region is not bad/terrible and yes we should have rankings, every region has bad players so don't insult one region because of a bad experience.
only league that even has any mechanical knowledge is challenger top 50, everyone else is dribble and even then some challengers suck
